title: #1602 The Mark and Dr. Drew Show
itunes:title: #1602 The Mark and Dr. Drew Show
description:
Dr. Drew is joined by fill in host Mark Geragos and they discuss an impending case that will be heard next year by the supreme court and what it might mean for the future of elections in America. They also discuss carbs and their mutual desire that Vinnie Tortorich would ease up on potatoes in his dietary direction.
